about_the_game:
Undying Harvest is a thrilling and unique farming survival game that pits you against the relentless hordes of the undead. As a courageous farmer, your idyllic life takes a dark turn when your once peaceful farm becomes ground zero for a zombie apocalypse. Now, it's up to you to cultivate your crops and defend your land against waves of relentless zombies, bats, and other undead creatures.


  • Farm, Fight, Survive: Immerse yourself in the dual challenges of cultivating a thriving farm and battling hordes of undead. Balance your time wisely between managing your crops and fending off waves of relentless undead.

  • Bountiful Harvest, Deadly Harvesters: Plant a variety of crops, nurture them to maturity, and harvest the rewards. But be prepared - the undead are attracted to the scent of fresh crops, making your farm a prime target.

  • Diverse Undead Threats: Face off against a multitude of undead adversaries, each with unique abilities and behaviors. From swarming zombies to agile bats, every encounter presents a new challenge that requires strategic thinking and quick reflexes.


Undead Harvest offers a unique blend of farming simulation and intense survival action. Can you cultivate a flourishing farm while fending off the relentless undead onslaught?
